name: bj-resta
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

body.origin:

|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wi(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c2, co(c0, crest, c2))))

comment: An elementwise intersection by a set on a family containing that set contains that set. (Contributed by BJ, 27-Apr-2021.)
